text.autoconfig.too_many_entities.option: Toggles the global max entity count
Toggles the global max hostile entity count
Toggles the global max passive entity count
Whether or not the mod is enabled
If this option is enabled, the nearest mobs will be visible, while the ones that are further away will be hidden if a maximum entity count is defined.
The maximum number of entities of a specific type to render. If this is set to 0, the limit is removed
The maximum number of hostile entities of a specific type to render. If this is set to 0, the limit is removed
The maximum number of passive entities of a specific type to render. If this is set to 0, the limit is removed

If this option is enabled, and the mod Entity Culling is installed, the number of entities rendered will be taken from the entity culling mod. This allows you to have more visible entities without necessarily reducing performance. There can be flickering when using this option, so only enable it if you want to.
text.autoconfig.too_many_entities.title: Too Many Entities
